class.name: tidyup_actions/action_executor_pickup_object
class.description: Action executor for picking up objects

class.name: tidyup_actions/action_executor_putdown_object
class.description: Action executor for putting down objects

class.name: tidyup_actions/action_executor_pickup_sponge
class.description: Action executor for picking up sponges

class.name: tidyup_actions/action_executor_putdown_sponge
class.description: Action executor for putting down sponges

class.name: tidyup_actions/action_executor_detect_door_state
class.description: Action executor for detecting the state of a door

class.name: tidyup_actions/action_executor_detect_door_state_angle
class.description: Action executor for detecting the state of a door by checking the opening angle.

class.name: tidyup_actions/action_executor_detect_objects
class.description: Action executor for detecting objects on a table

class.name: tidyup_actions/action_executor_open_door_service
class.description: Action executor for opening doors using service

class.name: tidyup_actions/action_executor_drive_through_door
class.description: Action executor for driving from one to another door location

class.name: tidyup_actions/action_executor_arm_to_side
class.description: Action executor for moving an arm to the side

class.name: tidyup_actions/action_executor_arm_to_carry
class.description: An action executor that moves an arm to a carry position.

class.name: tidyup_actions/goal_creator_tidyup_objects
class.description: Loads manipulation locations from a config file for static objects and doors and assigns them to their respective rooms.

class.name: tidyup_actions/state_creator_robot_pose
class.description: Sets the current robot pose in the state and possible at-style predicates.

class.name: tidyup_actions/state_creator_robot_location_in_room
class.description: Sets location-in-room for the robot pose if it is not set.
